Package server.user

Class UserStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.user.UserStore
  • public final class UserStore
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores users and their related attributes

      static java.util.regex.Pattern INVALID_USERID_PATTERN

    • Method Detail

      • getPublicUser

        public static NetPublicUser getPublicUser​(java.lang.String userId)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                          java.io.IOException
        Retrieves a NetPublicUser containing the data for the specified userId
        Parameters:
        userId - the userId of the user to retrieve
        Returns:
        a NetPublicUser containing the data for the specified userId
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified userId does not exist
        java.io.IOException - if there was an error reading the user's data

      • getUser

        public static User getUser​(java.lang.String userId,
                           java.security.Key decryptionKey)
                    throws java.lang.SecurityException
        Retrieves the user with the specified userId or null if none could be found or there was an error in retrieving them
        Parameters:
        userId - the userId of the user to retrieve
        decryptionKey - the key to use to read the user file if necessary
        Returns:
        the user with the specified userId
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to access the requested user
        See Also:
        getUserInternal(java.lang.String, java.security.Key)

      • login

        public static User login​(java.lang.String userId,
                         byte[] password)
        Retrieves the user with the specified userId and checks the given password against it
        Parameters:
        userId - the userId of the user to retrieve
        password - the password of the requested user
        Returns:
        the user with the specified userId or null if the password is incorrect

                                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Parameters:
        userId - the userId to retrieve the key for
        Returns:
        the user's secret key
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified user does not exist

        Parameters:

        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified user does not exist

      • createUser

        public static void createUser​(User user)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                              java.io.IOException,
                              java.lang.SecurityException
        Registers the given user and creates all required files
        Parameters:
        user - the user to create
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the userId of the given user is invalid
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error creating any of the required files
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the current user does not have the permissions to create the specified user
